about_the_game:
This tool lets you use your head and eye movements as an additional input layer for games, making gameplay feel more natural and fun. All you need is a camera.

It’s easy to set up and works with many types of games, from shooters to simulators. You’ll feel more connected to the action and enjoy a smoother, more immersive experience.

Key Features

  • Head Tracking: Look around in your favorite game by moving your head.

  • Eye Tracking: Adds an extra layer of control using your eyes.

  • Easy Setup: Install and start right away. Comes preconfigured with opentrack.

  • Wide Compatibility: 700+ supported games.

  • Gaze Estimation: Detects where you’re looking on the screen.

  • Cross-Platform: Supports both Windows and Linux (including games launched via Proton).

  • Lightning Fast: Runs purely on CPU with minimal resource demands.
